articles.description: The top 10 equity schemes offered XIRR returns of around 17-23% in the 10-year horizon. The XIRR returns were calculated for the period starting from April 10,2013 to April 10,2023.

articles.author: Shravani Sinha
articles.title: US FDA issues 3 observations under Form 483 for IPCA’s Piparia Unit - CNBCTV18
articles.description: USFDA issued three observations under Form 483 for IPCA Laboratories' formulations manufacturing unit situated at Piparia, Silvassa. The observations were followed by the USFDA inspection at the site from April 18 to April 26, 2023.

articles.title: OFSS dividend 2023: Board announces 4500% dividend; check out record date, payment date, other key details - Zee Business
articles.description: OFSS dividend 2023: OFSS announced a whopping dividend of 4,500 per cent for its shareholders. The Mumbai-based firm declared an interim dividend of Rs 225 per equity share of face value of Rs 5 each for the financial year 2022-23.
